title: Honor Capsules
body: I don't know like drop rates or honestly how the capsules work but I just got honor 4 but yet to have get a capsule but I know some of my honor 3 friends have gotten one. So if someone could explain to me that would be great.

replies.body: I feel like I've gotten more loots in Honor 3 than in Honor 4. All I've gotten from H4 is 1 key fragment at a time whereas H3 would give me 3-7 key fragments. I have yet to receive an H4 capsule but I've gotten 1 from H3.
I havent got shit. Honor level 4 btw. Shitty system.

Yea. Haven't gotten ANY at all recently. It would have been alright if the chances of dropping loots are higher once you level up, but this is ridiculous. I wish it had more to it than just make your loading screen look pretty. :/
Honor capsules have a chance of dropping once you're Honor Rank 3, and they have a *chance* of dropping any time a key fragment would have dropped.
What are the chances of getting a honor capsule and how often are key fragment dropped?

They're not telling drop rates so that people won't specifically go out and grind for honor rewards. It's stupid but the chances will never be revealed. Same for honor progress to the next level. They're not saying  how much honor progress you get so people won't grind for honor level.
But this whole game is a grind.  Why does it matter?

I mean I understand that they don't want people just to grind for them but I've played so many games especially right now because the aurf mode being out that honestly i think i have filled my whole match history in one day which is 20 games and it being out for a week now I probably played anywhere from 80-130 games and yet to have receive one and that's only from just one week and I was honor 4 two days after release of aurf and I think i got honor 3 one of the first days it was first released  and i still have yet to get one. So am I just like really unlucky??

I'm honor level 4 and I've gotten a bunch of key fragments (4 keys worth) and zero honor capsules. But they have a chance of dropping whenever you get a key fragment so I guess I'm just really unlucky.
